mapper.select: select A.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, B.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, B.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, C.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, B.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as ProductCreateDate, A.STORE_STOCK_AMOUNT as amount from store_stocks A, products B, CATEGORIES C where A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO and B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO and store_no = #{value} order by B.PRODUCT_NAME asc

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, A.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, A.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, A.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as productCreateDate, A.CATEGORY_NO as categoryNo, D.CATEGORY_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME, B.STORE_NO as storeNo, C.STORE_NAME as storeName, C.STORE_ADDRESS as storeAddress, C.STORE_TEL as storeTel, B.STORE_STOCK_AMOUNT as amount FROM PRODUCTS A, STORE_STOCKS B, STORES C, CATEGORIES D WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO and B.STORE_NO = C.STORE_NO and A.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO and A.product_no = #{value}

select A.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, B.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, B.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, C.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, B.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as ProductCreateDate, A.STORE_STOCK_AMOUNT as amount from store_stocks A, products B, CATEGORIES C where A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO and B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO and A.store_no = #{storeNo} and A.product_no = #{productNo}
select store_stock_amount from store_stocks where store_no = #{storeNo} and product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into store_stocks (store_no, product_no, store_stock_amount) values (#{storeNo}, #{productNo}, #{amount})
